template.name: ann
template.value: /** * 〈一句话功能简述〉 * 〈功能详细描述〉 * @param $param$ * @return $returnType$ * @exception/throws [违例类型] [违例说明] * @see [类、类#方法、类#成员] * @deprecated */

variable.name: param
variable.expression: groovyScript("def result=''; def params=\"${_1}\".replaceAll('[\\\\[|\\\\]|\\\\s]', '').split(',').toList(); for(i = 0; i < params.size(); i++) {result+=' * @param ' + params[i] + ((i < params.size() - 1) ? '\\n\\b' : '')}; return result", methodParameters())
